note:
Привет. Спасибо
Да, можете рассказать подробнее, я посмотрю, могут ли понадобиться ваши услуги
I need some beautiful posters/video to start marketing campaigns on it.
I prefer telegram
And I need SMM guy with design skills a little bit later

Update

Company Name : Levi Media & Productions Ltd

Company Website :  Https://www.levimediapro.com/

Contact Person : Asif Yagudaev

Specialties: Media Production 

Country-Location : Israel 

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement: Asif needs SMM to make posts and good videos for Facebook, tiktok and insta. He doesn’t provide any materials for it like pictures, videos, only content (texts, partially. Also creating content for social media ads. His budget is 200 usd. SMM should make 2 posts per week.

Next Step: send all information, CV

Next Contact Day: we’ll see if we find someone for this position or offer our candidates

The client was engaged by LG manager.

name: Kristina Polikhronidi
note:
апдейт

Company Name : coopeer 

Company Website :  https://www.linkedin.com/company/coopeer/about/ 

Contact Person : Kristina Polikhronidi

Specialties: Events Services

Country-Location : Czech Republic 

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement: Coopeer is a global business events company, focusing on banking and fintech. For more than 10 years we are connecting innovators worldwide. Now under the new brand Coopeer Events we are working on bridging the gap between international banking communities. Kristina interested in hiring sales executives for full time. They should have previous experience and make cold calls in English on daily basis. They would like to have a probation period and decide to continue only if they will provide good results. We offered our LG managers, they might consider it, but it is not something that works for them.  We will check presale candidates and share their CVs.

Next Step: send all information, CV

Next Contact Day: we’ll see if we find someone for this position 

The client was engaged by LG manager.

SM Marina (Ruzaliya)

name: Andreas Christoforides
note:
UPDATE
Developers
Лід працює в новій компанії Iclinic. Сайту і лінкедіну немає. Цікавиться розробниками.

Good day Andreas,
Happy Easter!
10% discount for new hirings in April.
Last month we had a call with you and you had an interest in our lead generation managers,  marketers, designers, developers and video editors. We would be happy to help you with that, but I need detailed requests for those positions, or just tasks that you want to be done. Are you ready to move on in April?
Kindly waiting for your reply,
Marina
Remote Helpers


Company Name : Iclinic 

Contact Person : Andreas Christoforides

Country-Location : Cyprus

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement : They are interested in LG managers, marketers, designers, developers and video editors. He wanted to know more about our service. Later he will discuss everything with his colleagues. They will look through the presentation and our website one more time and decide how they can utilize our service. After that he send an email with his request and will have one more call with us. He’ll inform us about the date via email.

Next Step: send all information about our services 

Next Contact Day : f-up in 1 week

The client was engaged by LG manager.

SM Marina (Ruzaliya)

We are going to discuss options for partnership in managing human resources for  ITERACTIVE in Ukraine. 

Website: rh-s.com

Company website: https://iteractive.eu/

Comments: Denis Cizik   

(https://www.linkedin.com/in/denis-cizik-04328b200)

Interested in our services, wants to know more, offered a video call.

Manager: Korzhova Liudmyla

11:00
Company Name : ITERACTIVE

Company Website : https://iteractive.eu/

Contact Person : Denis Cizik   
(https://www.linkedin.com/in/denis-cizik-04328b200)
 
Specialties: Staffing and Recruiting

Country-Location : Bratislava, Slovakia

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement : ITERACTIVE is a specialised international staffing platform with a vast experience over 10 years in white collar and blue collar segment. Our main goal is to provide well-paid and the most suitable job for all job seekers and offer to clients qualified personnel with the newest recruitment solutions without any borders. 

Denis wants to cooperate with us in different points as an affiliate partner. They have a big base of companies with their needs in services. There are lots spheres as Electricity and Hospitality, but for Marketing they also have. 
We explained the different models how we can proceed form our side: they can hire our candidate, our team of service, be our affiliate partner CPL and CPA.
Denis was very interesting in our flexibility and asked to have one more call on Wednesday the same time to conclude all the information into benefits for both sides.

Potential position(s)/Future needs: affiliate partner

Status by the position(s) (possible / impossible) : possible

Next Step: send all information about our services? draft of a contract

Next Contact Day : Wednesday, 19th of April

The client was engaged by LG manager.

SM Marina (Ruzaliya)
